date.description: When the operation should be considered performed

id.description: The id of the item being operated

operation.description: The identifier of the operation being performed

type.description: Identifies this as an ANS operation

version.description: The version of ANS this item is written in

https:__raw_githubusercontent_com_washin.description: Trait that represents an update event for a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

note.description: Optional note associated with this update.

status.description: The current status of the pitch.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made this update.

https:__raw_githubusercontent_com_washin.description: Trait that represents a pitch to a platform. In the Arc ecosystem, this data is generated by WebSked.

platform_path.description: The path of the platform that this pitch targets.

https:__raw_githubusercontent_com_washin.title: Platform pitch

schema.description: An operation to add or update a story's pitch to a WebSked platform.
